Improved Judgement.name: Improved Judgement
descriptions: Decreases the cooldown of your Judgement spell by 1 sec.
Decreases the cooldown of your Judgement spell by 2 sec.
Decreases the cooldown of your Judgement spell by 3 sec.

Conviction.name: Conviction
descriptions: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with attacks and offensive spells by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with attacks and offensive spells by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with attacks and offensive spells by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with attacks and offensive spells by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with attacks and offensive spells by 5%.

Improved Seal of the Crusader.name: Improved Seal of the Crusader
descriptions: Increases the holy damage and melee attack power bonuses of your Seal of the Crusader and the Holy damage increase of your Judgement of the Crusader by 5%.
Increases the holy damage and melee attack power bonuses of your Seal of the Crusader and the Holy damage increase of your Judgement of the Crusader by 10%.
Increases the holy damage and melee attack power bonuses of your Seal of the Crusader and the Holy damage increase of your Judgement of the Crusader by 15%.

Deflection.name: Deflection
descriptions: Increases your Parry chance by 2%.
Increases your Parry chance by 4%.
Increases your Parry chance by 6%.

Improved Retribution Aura.name: Improved Retribution Aura
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by 50%.
Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by 100%.

The Revenant.name: The Revenant
descriptions: Reduces the chance you are critically hit by 2%.
Reduces the chance you are critically hit by 4%.
Reduces the chance you are critically hit by 6%.

Blessed Strikes.name: Blessed Strikes
descriptions: Causes your attacks to ignore up to 180 of your target's Armor. The amount of Armor reduced scales with your level. Also, reduces threat caused by all actions by 4% except when under the effects of Righteous Fury.

Causes your attacks to ignore up to 360 of your target's Armor. The amount of Armor reduced scales with your level. Also, reduces threat caused by all actions by 8% except when under the effects of Righteous Fury.

Causes your attacks to ignore up to 540 of your target's Armor. The amount of Armor reduced scales with your level. Also, reduces threat caused by all actions by 12% except when under the effects of Righteous Fury.

Causes your attacks to ignore up to 720 of your target's Armor. The amount of Armor reduced scales with your level. Also, reduces threat caused by all actions by 16% except when under the effects of Righteous Fury.

Causes your attacks to ignore up to 900 of your target's Armor. The amount of Armor reduced scales with your level. Also, reduces threat caused by all actions by 20% except when under the effects of Righteous Fury.

Seal of Command.name: Seal of Command
descriptions:
Gives the Paladin a chance to deal additional Holy damage equal to 50% of normal weapon damage.  Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time.  Lasts 2 minutes.

Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 71.5 Holy damage, 143 if the target is stunned, incapacitated or disoriented.

Pursuit of Justice.name: Pursuit of Justice
descriptions: Increases movement and mounted movement speed by 5%.  This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.
Increases movement and mounted movement speed by 10%.  This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

Eye for an Eye.name: Eye for an Eye
descriptions: All spell hits against you cause 10% of the damage taken to the caster as well.
All spell hits against you cause 20% of the damage taken to the caster as well.

Benediction.name: Benediction
descriptions: Reduces the cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 10%.
Reduces the cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 20%.
Reduces the cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 30%.

Divine Might.name: Divine Might
descriptions:
Increases the effect of your Blessing of Might and Blessing of Kings by 10%.

Also increases their duration and reduces mana cost by 50%.

Increases the effect of your Blessing of Might and Blessing of Kings by 20%.

Also increases their duration and reduces mana cost by 100%.

Two-Handed Weapon Specialization.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 7%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 10%.

Sanctity Aura.name: Sanctity Aura
descriptions: Increases Holy damage done by party members within 30 yards by 10%.  Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

Vengeance.name: Vengeance
descriptions: Gives your critical strikes a 20% chance to increase damage you deal by 2% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to undefined times.
Gives your critical strikes a 40% chance to increase damage you deal by 2% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to undefined times.
Gives your critical strikes a 60% chance to increase damage you deal by 2% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to undefined times.
Gives your critical strikes a 80% chance to increase damage you deal by 2% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to undefined times.
Gives your critical strikes a 100% chance to increase damage you deal by 2% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to undefined times.

Repentance.name: Repentance
descriptions: Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them and increasing their Mana regeneration. Lasts up to 1 minute.  Any damage caused will awaken the target.  Only works against Humanoids.

Crusade.name: Crusade
descriptions: Increases spell damage and healing by up to 6% of your total Strength.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 12% of your total Strength.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 18% of your total Strength.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 24% of your total Strength.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 30% of your total Strength.

Improved Sanctity Aura.name: Improved Sanctity Aura
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Sanctity Aura by 3% and gives all group members affected by the aura an additional 3% bonus to healing done.
Increases the effect of your Sanctity Aura by 5% and gives all group members affected by the aura an additional 5% bonus to healing done.

Codex of the Silver Hand.name: Codex of the Silver Hand
descriptions:
Allow 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue during and for 5 sec after casting.
In addition, reduces the Mana cost of your Holy Light spell by 10%, but increases its casting time by 0.5 sec.

Allow 40% of your Mana regeneration to continue during and for 5 sec after casting.
In addition, reduces the Mana cost of your Holy Light spell by 20%, but increases its casting time by 1 sec.

Allow 60% of your Mana regeneration to continue during and for 5 sec after casting.
In addition, reduces the Mana cost of your Holy Light spell by 30%, but increases its casting time by 1.5 sec.

Allow 80% of your Mana regeneration to continue during and for 5 sec after casting.
In addition, reduces the Mana cost of your Holy Light spell by 40%, but increases its casting time by 2 sec.

Allow 100% of your Mana regeneration to continue during and for 5 sec after casting.
In addition, reduces the Mana cost of your Holy Light spell by 50%, but increases its casting time by 2.5 sec.

Inevitable Justice.name: Inevitable Justice
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of all Judgements by 50% and makes your Seals and Judgements undispellable.
